column8: Replacing PySpark with Snowpark: Sentiment Analysis
column9: Join Snowflake's Nick Akincilar, Phani Raj, and host Felipe Hoffa for a live conversation and demo showcasing the use of Snowpark in place of PySpark for data engineering and machine learning.

column8: Community Product Update: Streaming and Snowpark
column9: Join Jeff Hollan, James Malone, and host Felipe Hoffa for a community update from the Product Engineering Team! They’ll discuss streaming and Snowpark, while answering some of your questions LIVE.

column8: Live: Introduced at Snowflake Summit
column9: Join host Felipe Hoffa as he recaps Gen AI/LLM announcements made at Snowflake Summit with Data Superhero and Co-Founder & CEO of SELECT, Ian Whitestone, and Snowflake Developer Advocate, Dash Desai. The event will also feature a demo on how to get started with building Native Apps.

column8: Live: Cost Optimization on Snowflake
column9: Join host Felipe Hoffa joined by Snowflake Product Manager, Samartha Chandrashekar, and Developer Advocate, Gilberto Hernandez, (Developer Advocate) as they discuss best practices and recommendations on cost optimization including getting visibility into cost, warehouse optimization, warehouse utilization, and more.

column7: Powering LLMs with Llama 2 in Snowflake
column8: Live: Powering LLMs with Llama 2 in Snowflake
column9: Join host Felipe Hoffa with guest Snowflake's Justin Langseth as they discuss Llama 2, Snowpark Container Services (Private Preview), and more. Justin will demo and showcase how to run the LLM end-to-end all within Snowflake.

column8: Live: Snowpipe Streaming and Dynamic Tables
column9: Join host Felipe Hoffa with guest Tyler Akidau, Principal Software Engineer, as they showcase how Snowpipe Streaming enables low-latency batch ingestion directly into Snowflake tables.

column7: Optimizing Snowflake Costs with Observability & Accountability
column8: Live: Optimizing Snowflake Costs with Observability & Accountability
column9: Join Felipe Hoffa and Scott Redding, Sr Solutions Architect, as they discuss query tags, query fingerprinting, and warehouse size for queries to optimize cost.

column8: Live: External Network Access on Snowpark
column9: Join Felipe Hoffa and Nick Akincilar, Senior Sales Engineer, discuss the new Public Preview of External Network Access for Snowpark. See demos on how to perform web scraping and parse data and insights from the web.

column7: Getting Started Building with Snowflake Native Apps
column8: Live: Start Building with Snowflake Native Apps
column9: Join Felipe Hoffa, Gilberto Hernandez (Developer Advocate), and Sohail Zafar (Product Manager) as they demo building a Snowflake Native App, the provider and consumer side of the application, monetization, and more!

column8: Live: Streamlit Hackathon Winners Showcase
column9: Join host Felipe Hoffa with special guests Kaarthik Andavar, Randy Pettus, and Oleksandr Arsentiev who were this year’s Summit Hackathon winners. Each guest will demo the Streamlit app they built and will showcase how you can use their projects to inspire your own applications!

column8: Summit Recap: Data Platform
column9:
Join host Felipe Hoffa with Snowflake Director of Product Management Josh Klahr as they do a recap of their favorite moments from Snowflake Summit. Josh will also showcase the newest product and feature announcements from the Data Platform Team. 

Check out the Summit Recap Report and bring your live questions! https://www.snowflake.com/resource/5-key-takeaways-from-snowflake-summit/?utm_source=linkedin&utm_medium=social&utm_campaign=--en-linkedin&utm_content=-eb-linkedin

column7: Create Business Metrics with OM1, Hex, and Snowflake
column8: Create Business Metrics with OM1, Hex, and Snowflake
column9: Join host Felipe Hoffa with Armin Efendic (Partner Engineer, Hex) and Zachary Bryant (Associate Director Data & Analytics, OM1) as they discuss how OM1 incorporates Hex, Snowflake, and dbt into their data stack. We will dive deep into the architecture and creation of the Hex app that OM1 uses to enable business users to create their own business metrics.

column5: SnowConvert - Using SnowConvert For Code Conversion When Migrating To Snowflake
column7: Accelerate migrations to Snowflake with SnowConvert
column8: Accelerate migrations to Snowflake with SnowConvert
column9: Join host Felipe Hoffa with Snowflake’s Federico Zoufaly (Director of Migrations and Modernization) and Kuo Lun Lo (Senior Manager of Software Apps) as they discuss how the SnowConvert tool can help accelerate your transition to Snowflake by reducing the manual work by 50-70% with availability for Free Assessment and Table conversion for Oracle, SQL Server and Teradata. We’ll discuss how SnowConvert can help you tackle advanced code conversions.

column6: Live Video | Python Data Pipelines What's New
column7: What’s New in Python Data Pipelines
column8: What’s New in Python Data Pipelines
column9: Do you like working in Python? Want to know how to use it more in your Snowflake experience? Jeff Hollan, director of product management at Snowflake, and Felipe Hoffa, developer advocate, discuss some of the latest announcements to arm you with capabilities to build data pipelines in Python. You’ll learn about transforming data in Python with Snowpark, now with some of the most popular Python libraries, a Python API, native Notebook experience, and the latest capabilities to operationalize your pipelines.

column8: Snowflake Connector for Kafka
column9: Join host Daniel Myers with Brad Culberson (Snowflake Technical Director) as they discuss the capabilities and uses of the Snowflake Connector for Kafka. Built on top of the Kafka Connect Framework, the connector takes Kafka topics and uploads them to Snowflake for immediate availability. Explore the docs today to learn more! https://docs.snowflake.com/en/user-guide/kafka-connector

column8: POLARIS CATALOG NOW OPEN SOURCE
column9:
Join host Vino Duraisamy with Snowflake Senior Software Engineer, Michael Collado, as they discuss Polaris Catalog: now open source! 

Polaris Catalog implements the Apache Iceberg™ open REST API for multi-engine interoperability with Apache Doris™, Apache Flink™, Apache Spark™, PyIceberg, StarRocks, Trino, and more. 

Learn how to make contributions to the project and bring your live questions!

column5: Public Preview has started! PostgreSQL and MySQL connectors
column7: Snowflake Native Connectors for PostgreSQL and MySQL
column8: Snowflake Native Connectors for PostgreSQL and MySQL
column9:
Join host Kamesh Sampath with Jakub Puchalski (Snowflake Senior Product Manager) as they discuss the public preview of the new PostgreSQL and MySQL database connectors built on top of Snowpipe Streaming.

Learn how to get started with the Connector app in the Snowflake Marketplace and how to set up MySQL and PostgreSQL connectors to get instant access to your data.

column8: What’s New: Improved productivity with new developer experiences for python
column9: Join host Daniel Myers with Jason Freeberg (Snowflake Product Manager) to discuss new developer experiences for python that improve productivity and provide cost savings for prototyping with local testing (GA) and python user-defined aggregate functions (public preview). The conversation will go into each feature and include demos and tips to help you get started.

column8: [LIVE] Automatic Clustering Updates
column9: Host Vino Duraisamy is joined by Snowflake Product Manager Tim Sander to discuss how you can utilize automatic clustering to improve query efficiency. We’ll discuss how to use automatic clustering, the new features around cost estimation, micro-partitioning, and performance improvements, followed by a demo to see it all in action.

column8: [Demo] Python Data Engineering with Snowflake Notebooks
column9: Join host Daniel Myers with Jeremiah Hansen(Principal Architect, Data Engineering, Global Field CTO Office) to discuss data processing in Python. Jeremiah will demonstrate how to build python pipelines in Snowflake Notebooks and will provide all the details needed to manage and deploy those Notebooks through an automated CI/CD pipeline from development to production.
